caption.p: Comparison of E a estimates for the rise responses of physiological rates GP max, NP max and R d for eight seaweeds that followed divergent upward (white bars) and downward (black bars) abundance trends in NW Iberia along the last decade. 95% confidence intervals calculated after adjusting the experiment wise error rate with the Bonferroni method. No bar shown for GP max and NP max of H. elongata due to poor fitting. See TableÂ 1 for species abbreviations.
